document_data.name: Sayings of the North
document_data.author: [[Annath]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Sayings of the North''''' was a [[book]] compiled by [[Annath]] of [[Neverwinter]] in the late 13{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''At last even the old [[wolf]] lies down under the weight of his years. He may be strong, but know ye: some years are heavier than others.''|Excerpt from ''Sayings of the North''}}
